abstract: Skype is moving forward on an initial public offering that could be valued at as much as $1 billion, but investors will have to wait until next year before it prices, Reuters reported.
snippet: Skype is moving forward on an initial public offering that could be valued at as much as $1 billion, but investors will have to wait until next year before it prices, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Skype is moving forward on an initial public offering that could be valued at as much as $1 billion, but investors will have to wait until next year before it prices, Reuters reported, citing several people close to the situation.

headline.main: Skype Said to Weigh $1 Billion I.P.O. Next Year

abstract: China Construction Bank, the country’s No. 2 lender plans to raise up to 61.62 billion yuan ($9.2 billion) through a rights issue this month, less than expected, to shore up its balance sheet after a 2009 lending binge.
snippet: China Construction Bank, the country’s No. 2 lender plans to raise up to 61.62 billion yuan ($9.2 billion) through a rights issue this month, less than expected, to shore up its balance sheet after a 2009 lending binge.
lead_paragraph: China Construction Bank, the No. 2 Chinese lender, plans to raise up to 61.62 billion yuan ($9.2 billion) through a rights issue this month, less than analysts expected, to shore up its balance sheet after a 2009 lending binge.

headline.main: China Construction Bank Plans Rights Issue
